description:
Apply a loan account to a client who has a saving account.
View the loan before approving it, go to More -> Create Guarantor
Leave the 'existing client' selected, fill the name of the same client
The system will display the client details but will not display the place to fill the saving account and amount for guarantee.

Refer the link for screenshots:
name: Fetch Space To Fill Saving When Creating A Guarantor Who Is An Existing Client
